label: 執権
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: Post designating the Kamakura shogunal regent; held in heredity by the Hōjō family. Also, an alternative for director (bettō) of a mandokoro and a term used for other high-ranking administrative positions.　[別当、政所]　[Cf.　Mass, 1976.]
